attributes.action: No confidence in the PM or parliamentary ministers.
attributes.background:
A total mess of the Brexit negotiations, delay after delay.
The former PM said no customs union, both parties said they would honor the vote, the current PM and both parties have betrayed this country and we have no confidence.

We want to leave the EU and not in name only, no deal if needed

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for someone to be given or lose their job. That includes motions of no confidence.

If you would like another general election, you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
